title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Software-Based Optimal Design for Nanoscale Biosystem Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze parametric relationships describing interactions between multi-level components of nanoscale biosystems.
Learners can predict and explain causal relationships occurring at the system level using agent-based simulations.
Learners can perform iterative design improvements (at least three cycles) via a software interface to enhance target performance by over 20%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
